item.title: Adding svgrepo.com to the list
item.description: https://www.svgrepo.com/ - Explore, search and find the best fitting icons or vectors for your projects using wide variety vector library. Download free SVG Vectors for commercial use.

item.title: Add coupler.io to APIs, Data and ML section
item.description: https://www.coupler.io/ - Data integration tool that syncs between apps. It can create live dashboards and reports, transform and manipulate values, collect and back up insights. The free plan has unlimited users, 100 runs with 1000 rows a month and unlimited integrations.

item.title: add Upstash Kafka to messaging section
item.description: https://upstash.com/kafka - - Serverless Kafka Cloud offering with per-request-pricing. It has a free tier with max 10000 messages per day.

item.title: Custom changed to costom
item.description: https://www.divio.com/ - A platform to manage cloud application deploying only using Docker. Available free subscription for development projects, Requires card and no custom domain support.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://onlineornot.com/) - OnlineOrNot is a reliable uptime monitor for both JS-based web apps and websites. 10 uptime checks (for static websites and APIs - OnlineOrNot is a reliable uptime monitor for both JS-based web apps and websites. 10 uptime checks (for static websites and APIs) with a 5 minute interval, 1 browser check with a 15 minute interval. Free for up to 3 users, alerts via Slack, Discord, and Email.
